snippet.title: Q.U.B.E. 2 Official Teaser Trailer | First-Person Puzzle Adventure
snippet.description:
Q.U.B.E. 2 is OUT NOW on Steam, Xbox One and Playstation 4.

YOU CAN NOW BUY Q.U.B.E. 2 ON STEAM:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/359100/QUBE_2/

Playstation 4: http://bit.ly/2FJwmsl
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/2HzvPdk

Q.U.B.E. 2 is a first-person puzzle adventure game and sequel to the award-winning puzzle game, Q.U.B.E. 

For more information, check out our website and our social media channels: 

Official Website: https://www.toxicgames.co.uk 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/qubegame 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/qubegame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/toxicgamesstudio

Toxic Games is an independent game development studio based in the U.K. which specialises in brain-twisting, first-person puzzle games.
Q.U.B.E. 2 Press Kit: https://goo.gl/V7Uqiw
